long_description: Helpful for minor backcountry injuries, the X-Large Sawyer SAM Splint is big enough to splint injured arms or legs and uses soft aluminum alloy surrounded by foam for secure, comfortable support. Aluminum alloy core sandwiched between two layers of closed-cell foam provides comfortable support; splint affixes with athletic tape or wrap. 1.5 in. wider than its regular-sized counterpart, the X-large splint measures 36 x 5.5 in., making it easier to splint long bones such as femurs. Splint wipes clean and is reusable.
